episodeList.title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

episode.description: Kiyo, the Maiko House live-in cook, sees her friend Sumire accompanying older maiko. Sumire's dedication soon leads to her debut as a maiko, and she runs to share her excitement with Kiyo.
episode.subtitle: Chapter 1: Kiyo and Sumire
episode.title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House -

episode.description: Sumire struggles to fall asleep on an unfamiliar pillow after having her hair styled for the first time in a traditional maiko bun. Sleepless, she finds Kiyo waiting for her in the kitchen.
episode.subtitle: Chapter 4: For Sleepless Nights
episode.title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House -

episode.content: About a year ago, in Aomori Prefecture. Kiyo is spending time with her grandma while getting ready for her and Sumire's departure to Kyoto that evening. Later, Kiyo, Sumire and Kenta have fun reminiscing about their childhood, and Kiyo's grandma serves them a specialty dish from the region to celebrate. Just before boarding the night bus, Sumire discovers what Kiyo has packed from home, as her grandma and Kenta look on.
episode.description: Kiyo and Sumire have come to Kyoto far away from their hometown, dreaming to become maiko. However, after an unexpected turn of events, Kiyo starts working as a live-in cook at "Maiko House".
episode.subtitle: Chapter 7: Kiyo Arrives in Kyoto Part 1, Chapter 8: Kiyo Arrives in Kyoto Part 2, Chapter 9: An Apprentice Maiko's Morning
episode.title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House -
